name: Readings from Dust.
description:
Oracular boardgame using found text from the Octogon, Dunedin, New Zealand.

USE LEFT AND RIGHT ARROW KEYS to throw dice and pick directions.

Travel around the board collecting fragments of text. to build your oracle. Once you roll a number 3 times your oracle is complete.

Development ceased when it was realised not quite enough text had been collected to fill the entire board if the maximum amount of numbers were rolled before you got three of a kind.

Made in stencyl c.2017
